esprits.name: Blazeblob
esprits.description: A bouncy little fire spirit that leaves tiny scorch marks everywhere it goes. Gets excited easily.

esprits.name: Droozle
esprits.description: A chubby water blob that wiggles when happy. Makes splash sounds when poked.

esprits.name: Gloomb
esprits.description: A shadowy blob that giggles softly in dark corners. Probably harmless. Probably.

esprits.name: Muddroot
esprits.description: A sleepy moss mound that grows tiny leaves when content. Moves very, very slowly.

esprits.name: Shynix
esprits.description: A gentle glowing spirit that smells like vanilla and starlight. Warm to the touch.

esprits.name: Jelune
esprits.description: A wobbly air spirit that never stops moving. Bounces across water and rides wind currents for fun.

esprits.name: Emberjaw
esprits.description: A fierce little cyclops whose single eye burns with determination. Despite its small size, it practices intimidating poses in mirrors.

esprits.name: Crysthide
esprits.description: A crystalline ice cyclops that clinks softly when it walks. Its spiky exterior hides a surprisingly gentle nature - it apologizes when it accidentally freezes things.

esprits.name: Boulderback
esprits.description: A sturdy earth cyclops with bark-like skin and tiny mushrooms growing on its shoulders. Moves slowly but never gives up, even when everyone else has gone home.

esprits.name: Mistral
esprits.description: A wispy air cyclops that's constantly surrounded by gentle breezes. Has trouble sitting still and occasionally floats when excited.

esprits.name: Verdiant
esprits.description: A moss-covered cyclops whose eye gem glows with forest light. Tiny flowers bloom wherever it steps, and it hums to help plants grow faster.

esprits.name: Cyghost
esprits.description: A spooky little cyclops that phases in and out of visibility. Pretends to be scary but mostly just wants to make friends and occasionally succeeds in startling people by accident.

esprits.name: Emberwolf
esprits.description: A young fire wolf whose tail burns brighter when excited. Has a habit of accidentally setting small things on fire when happy, then looking very apologetic about it.

esprits.name: Thornpup
esprits.description: A forest wolf cub with moss growing along its spine. Tiny flowers bloom in its pawprints, and it gets distracted chasing butterflies during serious moments.

esprits.name: Stormcub
esprits.description: A spiky-furred storm pup that crackles with static electricity. Gets overly excited during thunderstorms and has been known to accidentally summon rain clouds when playing.

esprits.name: Frostpup
esprits.description: An ice-touched wolf cub whose breath forms tiny snow clouds. Surprisingly warm to the touch despite its icy appearance, and loves to play in puddles that mysteriously freeze when it steps in them.

esprits.name: Shadowcub
esprits.description: A dark-furred wolf pup that phases in and out of shadows when nervous. Tries very hard to look intimidating but undermines the effect by wagging its tail when complimented.

esprits.name: Glowpup
esprits.description: A gentle wolf cub whose fur glows with soft golden light. Has a habit of accidentally healing minor scrapes just by being nearby, and gets embarrassed when its glow brightens during emotional moments.

esprits.name: Frostcrag
esprits.description: A hulking creature of living ice that moves with surprising grace. Frost spreads from its footsteps, and its breath can freeze water solid.

esprits.name: Mossback
esprits.description: A sturdy forest dweller whose bark-like hide grows flowers in spring. Small animals often nest in the moss on its shoulders.

esprits.name: Cinderbolt
esprits.description: A crackling mass of flame and fury that never sits still. Its fiery punches leave scorch marks that glow for hours afterward.

esprits.name: Geargrind
esprits.description: A construct of bronze and lightning that hums with electrical energy. Sparks fly when it moves, and its joints crackle with stored power.

esprits.name: Voidstone
esprits.description: A being of crystallized shadow that seems to absorb light around it. Even its footsteps make no sound on solid ground.

esprits.name: Prismheart
esprits.description: A gentle giant that glows with soft, warm light. Its crystal body refracts sunlight into beautiful rainbow patterns that dance on nearby walls.

esprits.name: Pyraxis
esprits.description: A massive fire dragon with glowing crimson scales. Her wings beat with controlled fury and flames dance along her claws.

esprits.name: Azurewing
esprits.description: A storm dragon born from crystallized clouds. Lightning flickers across her shimmering wings as she soars.

esprits.name: Glacivern
esprits.description: An ancient ice dragon carved from glacial ice. Her breath can freeze entire lakes solid in seconds.

esprits.name: Stormbreaker
esprits.description: A shadow dragon whose dark scales absorb light itself. Her roar echoes with ancient power.

esprits.name: Thornwarden
esprits.description: A forest dragon whose scales bloom with living moss and thorns. New growth follows wherever she treads.

esprits.name: Radiara
esprits.description: A golden dragon whose scales shimmer with inner light. Her presence brings healing warmth to those she deems worthy.

esprits.name: Ruby
esprits.description: A legendary warrior whose twin blades burn with crimson fire. Her winged armor radiates intense heat.

esprits.name: Luna
esprits.description: A wild sorceress who commands storms with unpredictable power. Her magical wheel spins with chaotic energy.

esprits.name: Nerida
esprits.description: A master of deep ocean currents whose staff channels the power of ancient tides.

esprits.name: Morticia
esprits.description: An elegant shadow mage who wields darkness with deadly precision. Her presence drains warmth from the air.

esprits.name: Rose
esprits.description: A nature guardian whose beauty hides thorned defenses. Her armor grows from living plants.

esprits.name: Aurora
esprits.description: A holy warrior who carries ancient light magic in her blade. Her sword gleams with divine power.

esprits.name: Pyritha
esprits.description: A master of flame elevated to divine levels. Her fires burn with perfect precision, purifying corruption without harming the pure.

esprits.name: Storia
esprits.description: Mistress of eternal storms who commands the winds between realms. Her tempests reshape landscapes with every breath.

esprits.name: Oceania
esprits.description: A mystical oracle who communes with the deepest ocean trenches. Her wisdom flows from unfathomable depths.

esprits.name: Verdania
esprits.description: Nature's final judgment given form. Her thorns grow through the cracks in reality itself.

esprits.name: Sylvanna
esprits.description: Nature's keeper of secret knowledge, crowned with thorns. She rules the spaces between growth and decay.

esprits.name: Lumensis
esprits.description: Divine light refined into perfect form. Her radiance doesn't just illuminate but transforms, revealing true essence.

esprits.name: Pyroclasm
esprits.description: The final ember of dying stars given form. Reality burns like kindling in her presence.

esprits.name: Tempesta
esprits.description: The storm that ends all weather. Her winds scatter the forces that hold atoms together.

esprits.name: Thalassa
esprits.description: The deepest ocean's final secret. Her depths contain the weight of everything that has ever drowned.

esprits.name: Nethys
esprits.description: The void between thoughts made real. She doesn't destroy things. She makes them never have existed.

esprits.name: Lumina
esprits.description: Divine judgment corrupted into perfect destruction. Her light burns away the flaws in existence itself.

esprits.name: Rosalia
esprits.description: The final bloom before entropy's end. Her thorned crown commands the last garden where existence takes root.
